thread.title: Marks & Spencer clothing boss John Dixon quits
thread.title_full: Marks & Spencer clothing boss John Dixon quits

author: Ashley Armstrong
title: Marks & Spencer clothing boss John Dixon quits
text: Retail and Consumer Marks & Spencer clothing boss John Dixon quits John Dixon, who is in charge of all Marks & Spencer's non-food business, is understood to have quit the high street retailer Marks & Spencer has been battling declines in its general merchandise division Photo: ALAMY By Ashley Armstrong , and Graham Ruddick 5:49PM BST 16 Jul 2015
